summary.span: 表示組件 (Assembly)，此組件是可重複使用、可控制版本和自我描述的 Common Language Runtime 應用程式建置區塊。

span.span: Represents an assembly, which is a reusable, versionable, and self-describing building block of a common language runtime application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用載入組件，來瀏覽組件，來探索包含組件中的型別，以及建立這些類型的執行個體的中繼資料和構成組件的類別。Use the class to load assemblies, to explore the metadata and constituent parts of assemblies, to discover the types contained in assemblies, and to create instances of those types. 若要取得的陣列物件表示目前組件載入至應用程式定義域 （例如，預設應用程式定義域的簡單的專案），使用方法。To get an array of objects representing the assemblies currently loaded into an application domain (for example, the default application domain of a simple project), use the method. 以動態方式載入的組件類別提供下列的靜態方法 (`Shared`方法，在 Visual Basic 中的)。To load assemblies dynamically, the class provides the following static methods (`Shared` methods in Visual Basic). 組件會載入至應用程式定義域發生載入作業。Assemblies are loaded into the application domain where the load operation occurs. - 載入組件的建議的方式是使用方法，用來識別要由其顯示名稱所載入的組件 (例如，"System.Windows.Forms，Version = 2.0.0.0，文化特性 = neutral，PublicKeyToken = b77a5c561934e089")。The recommended way to load assemblies is to use the method, which identifies the assembly to be loaded by its display name (for example, "System.Windows.Forms, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089"). 組件搜尋遵循規則中所述[執行階段如何找出組件](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md)。The search for the assembly follows the rules described in [How the Runtime Locates Assemblies](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md). - 和方法可讓您載入的組件反映，但無法執行。The and methods enable you to load an assembly for reflection, but not for execution. 比方說，在 32 位元平台執行的程式碼可以檢查 64 位元平台為目標的組件。For example, an assembly that targets a 64-bit platform can be examined by code that is running on a 32-bit platform. - 和方法提供極少數的情況下必須路徑所識別的組件中。The and methods are provided for rare scenarios in which an assembly must be identified by path. 若要取得物件目前正在執行的組件使用方法。To get an object for the currently executing assembly, use the method. 許多成員的類別提供組件的資訊。Many members of the class provide information about an assembly. 例如: For example: - 方法會傳回提供組件顯示名稱的組件的存取的物件。The method returns an object that provides access to the parts of the assembly display name. - 方法會列出套用至組件的屬性。The method lists the attributes applied to the assembly. - 方法提供在組件資訊清單檔案的存取權。The method provides access to the files in the assembly manifest. - 方法提供一組件資訊清單中的資源名稱。The method provides the names of the resources in the assembly manifest. 方法清單和組件中的所有類型。The method lists all the types in the assembly. 方法列出呼叫者在組件外部可見的類型。The method lists the types that are visible to callers outside the assembly. 方法可以用來搜尋特定型別的組件中。The method can be used to search for a particular type in the assembly. 方法可以用來搜尋和建立組件中類型的執行個體。The method can be used to search for and create instances of types in the assembly. 如需有關組件的詳細資訊，請參閱中的 < 應用程式定義域和組件 > 一節[應用程式定義域](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md)主題。For more information on assemblies, see the "Application Domains and Assemblies" section in the [Application Domains](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md) topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得目前執行的組件、 建立包含在該組件，類型的執行個體和叫用其中一種類型的方法具有晚期繫結。The following code example shows how to obtain the currently executing assembly, create an instance of a type contained in that assembly, and invoke one of the type's methods with late binding. 基於此目的，在程式碼範例定義名為類別`Example`，名為的方法與`SampleMethod`。For this purpose, the code example defines a class named `Example`, with a method named `SampleMethod`. 類別的建構函式會接受一個整數，用來計算該方法的傳回值。The constructor of the class accepts an integer, which is used to compute the return value of the method. 程式碼範例也示範如何使用方法，以取得可以用來剖析組件的完整名稱的物件。The code example also demonstrates the use of the method to obtain an object that can be used to parse the full name of the assembly. 此範例會顯示組件的版本號碼屬性，而屬性。The example displays the version number of the assembly, the property, and the property. [!code-cpp[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyClass/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 找不到執行階段是否`typeName`中執行個體，它會傳回`null`而不是擲回例外狀況。If the runtime is unable to find `typeName` in the instance, it returns `null` instead of throwing an exception. 這可能是因為：This might happen because: - 您尚未指定型別的完整的名稱。You haven't specified the fully qualified name of the type. - 您所指定的完整限定的類型名稱，但其不符合類型之大小寫屬性。You've specified the fully qualified type name, but its case doesn’t match the case of the type's property. 如需不區分大小寫的比較`typeName`類型的完整名稱，與呼叫多載，並指定`true`如`ignoreCase`引數。For a case-insensitive comparison of `typeName` with the type's full name, call the overload and specify `true` for the `ignoreCase` argument. - 類型不存在於目前執行個體。The type doesn’t exist in the current instance. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Person`類別並呼叫具現化的方法。The following example defines a `Person` class and calls the method to instantiate it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 找不到執行階段是否`typeName`中執行個體，它會傳回`null`而不是擲回例外狀況。If the runtime is unable to find `typeName` in the instance, it returns `null` instead of throwing an exception. 這可能是因為：This might happen because: - 您尚未指定型別的完整的名稱。You haven't specified the fully qualified name of the type. - 類型不存在於目前執行個體。The type doesn’t exist in the current instance. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Person`類別。The following example defines a `Person` class. 然後它會呼叫方法具現化，但因為其大小寫的`typeName`引數不符合的型別屬性，該方法會傳回`null`。It then calls the method to instantiate it, but because the casing of the `typeName` argument doesn’t match that of the type's property, the method returns `null`. 當範例會傳遞至相同的字串多載，並指定比較是否應區分大小寫，`Person`找到類別，和`Person`成功地具現化物件。When the example passes the same string to the overload and specifies that the comparison should be case-insensitive, the `Person` class is found, and a `Person` object is successfully instantiated. summary.span: 傳回方法的 ，其叫用目前執行的方法。

span.span: Returns the of the method that invoked the currently executing method.

returns.span: 方法的 物件，其叫用目前執行的方法。

span.span: The object of the method that invoked the currently executing method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法呼叫方法在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器內嵌展開其呼叫端是否內嵌展開，組件，或者傳回可能與預期不同。If the method that calls the method is expanded inline by the just-in-time (JIT) compiler, or if its caller is expanded inline, the assembly that is returned by may differ unexpectedly. 例如，請考慮下列方法和組件：For example, consider the following methods and assemblies: - 方法`M1`組件中`A1`呼叫。Method `M1` in assembly `A1` calls . - 方法`M2`組件中`A2`呼叫`M1`。Method `M2` in assembly `A2` calls `M1`. - 方法`M3`組件中`A3`呼叫`M2`。Method `M3` in assembly `A3` calls `M2`. 當`M1`就不會內嵌，傳回`A2`。When `M1` is not inlined, returns `A2`. 當`M1`為內嵌，傳回`A3`。When `M1` is inlined, returns `A3`. 同樣地，當`M2`就不會內嵌，傳回`A2`。Similarly, when `M2` is not inlined, returns `A2`. 當`M2`為內嵌，傳回`A3`。When `M2` is inlined, returns `A3`. 也會發生這種效果時`M1`會從的 tail 呼叫執行`M2`，或當`M2`會從的 tail 呼叫執行`M3`。This effect also occurs when `M1` executes as a tail call from `M2`, or when `M2` executes as a tail call from `M3`. 您可以防止 JIT 編譯器內嵌呼叫的方法，藉由套用屬性附帶旗標，但沒有類似的機制，可防止 tail 呼叫。You can prevent the JIT compiler from inlining the method that calls , by applying the attribute with the flag, but there is no similar mechanism for preventing tail calls. ## Examples 下列範例會取得目前方法的呼叫組件。The following example gets the calling assembly of the current method. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CPP/getcallingassembly1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CS/getcallingassembly1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/VB/getcallingassembly1.vb#4)]

ConstructorInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags()ConstructorInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags()| |MarshalAsAttributeMarshalAsAttribute|不同的位元。Various bits.|沒有存取子。No accessor.| |PreserveSigAttributePreserveSigAttribute|CorMethodImpl.miOLECorMethodImpl.miOLE|MethodInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags().OLEMethodInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags().OLE

ConstructorInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags().OLEConstructorInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags().OLE| |InAttributeInAttribute|CorParamAttr.pdInCorParamAttr.pdIn|ParameterInfo.Attributes.InParameterInfo.Attributes.In| |OutAttributeOutAttribute|CorParamAttr.pdOutCorParamAttr.pdOut|ParameterInfo.Attributes.OutParameterInfo.Attributes.Out| |StructLayoutAttributeStructLayoutAttribute|CorTypeAttr.tdLayoutSequentialCorTypeAttr.tdLayoutSequential

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以傳回`null`時已從 unmanaged 應用程式載入 managed 組件。The method can return `null` when a managed assembly has been loaded from an unmanaged application. 例如，如果未受管理的應用程式建立寫在 C# 中，呼叫 COM 元件的執行個體從 C# 元件的方法會傳回 null，因為在程序的進入點是 unmanaged 程式碼，而不是 managed 組件。For example, if an unmanaged application creates an instance of a COM component written in C#, a call to the method from the C# component returns null, because the entry point for the process was unmanaged code rather than a managed assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只會搜尋目前組件執行個體。This method only searches the current assembly instance. `name`參數包含命名空間，但不是組件。The `name` parameter includes the namespace but not the assembly. 若要搜尋其他類型的組件，請使用方法多載，可以選擇性地包含組件顯示名稱的型別名稱的一部分。To search other assemblies for a type, use the method overload, which can optionally include an assembly display name as part of the type name. > [!NOTE] > 如果類型已轉送至另一個組件，它仍會傳回這個方法。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 類型轉送上的資訊，請參閱[Common Language Runtime 中的類型轉送](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). ## Examples 下列範例會定義抽象`MeansOfTransportation`類別`Transportation`命名空間。The following example defines an abstract `MeansOfTransportation` class in the `Transportation` namespace. 它會呼叫方法來擷取其物件、 呼叫方法來取得陣列的物件，代表類型的內容，然後顯示在類型上的資訊抽象屬性。It calls the method to retrieve its object, calls the method to get an array of objects that represent the type's properties, and then displays information on the type's abstract properties. 請注意，呼叫方法使用的類型完整的名稱 （亦即，其型別名稱以及其命名空間）。Note that the call to the method uses the type's fully qualified name (that is, its namespace along with its type name). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只會搜尋目前組件執行個體。This method only searches the current assembly instance. `name`參數包含命名空間，但不是組件。The `name` parameter includes the namespace but not the assembly. 若要搜尋其他類型的組件，請使用方法多載，可以選擇性地包含組件顯示名稱的型別名稱的一部分。To search other assemblies for a type, use the method overload, which can optionally include an assembly display name as part of the type name. > [!NOTE] > 如果類型已轉送至另一個組件，它仍會傳回這個方法。If the type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is still returned by this method. 類型轉送上的資訊，請參閱[Common Language Runtime 中的類型轉送](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). `throwOnError`參數只會影響找不到類型時，會發生什麼事。The `throwOnError` parameter only affects what happens when the type is not found. 它不會影響其他可能會擲回的例外狀況。It does not affect any other exceptions that might be thrown. 特別是，如果找到的類型，但無法載入，可能會擲回即使`throwOnError`是`false`。In particular, if the type is found but cannot be loaded, can be thrown even if `throwOnError` is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的陣列會包含巢狀型別。The returned array includes nested types. 如果組件和類型上呼叫方法，因為組件會相依於尚未載入 （例如，如果其衍生自第二個組件中的型別），組件中類型就會擲回。If the method is called on an assembly and a type in that assembly is dependent on a type in an assembly that has not been loaded (for example, if it derives from a type in the second assembly), a is thrown. 比方說，這種情況的第一個組件已載入與或未載入方法和第二個組件。For example, this can happen if the first assembly was loaded with the or methods, and the second assembly was not loaded. 它也可能發生之組件使用載入和方法，如果第二個組件找不到時方法呼叫。It can also happen with assemblies loaded using the and methods if the second assembly cannot be located when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 如果類型已轉送至另一個組件，它不包含傳回陣列中。If a type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is not included in the returned array. 類型轉送上的資訊，請參閱[Common Language Runtime 中的類型轉送](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md). 若要擷取的集合物件而非陣列的物件，使用屬性。To retrieve a collection of objects instead of an array of objects, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在指定的組件中的型別上的其中一種方法的參數。The following example displays parameters of one method on a type in the specified assembly. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CPP/assembly.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CS/assembly.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/VB/assembly.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法載入的組件的信任層級時呼叫的組件的信任層級相同。The trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the calling assembly. 若要從應用程式定義域的信任層級的位元組陣列載入組件，請使用方法多載。To load an assembly from a byte array with the trust level of the application domain, use the method overload. 如需詳細資訊的使用相關的辨識項使用的多載方法採用位元組陣列，請參閱方法多載。For more information about the use of evidence with overloads of the method that take byte arrays, see the method overload. 反映在 c + + 可執行檔上可能會擲回。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 這可能是因為 c + + 編譯器移除重新配置位址所或`.reloc`從可執行檔的區段。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`位址的 c + + 可執行檔中，指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 請注意，這個方法多載一律會建立新物件與它自己的對應。Note that this method overload always creates a new object with its own mapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果擲回`assemblyRef`指定完整的組件名稱和第一個符合的簡單名稱的組件具有不同的版本、 文化特性或公開金鑰語彙基元。 is thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies the full assembly name and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a different version, culture, or public key token. 載入器不會繼續探查比對的簡單名稱的其他組件。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. > [!NOTE] > 請勿使用只含屬性集。Do not use an with only the property set. 屬性沒有提供任何項目 （例如名稱或版本） 的組件識別，因此載入不會發生負載所識別的規則，根據您所預期從方法。The property does not supply any elements of the assembly identity (such as name or version), so loading does not occur according to load-by-identity rules, as you would expect from the method. 相反地，載入組件使用載入來源的規則。Instead, the assembly is loaded using load-from rules. 使用載入內容的缺點的相關資訊，請參閱方法多載或[組件載入的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md)。For information about the disadvantages of using the load-from context, see the method overload or [Best Practices for Assembly Loading](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md). 是否將某些使用權限授予組件則以辨識項 (Evidence) 為基礎。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 組件和安全性辨識項合併的規則如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 當您使用方法沒有參數，已載入組件使用載入器提供的辨識項。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 當您使用方法合併片段的辨識項的參數。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段方法取代載入器所提供的辨識項的片段。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 當您使用方法多載`Byte[]`載入的通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 映像，辨識項的參數都繼承自呼叫組件。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 這適用於.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和後續版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 未安裝 SP1，當您使用 1.1 版和.NET Framework 1.0 版中方法多載`Byte[]`結合載入 （coff） 映像，辨識項的參數。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`和`Site`都繼承自呼叫的組件，以及`Hash`和`StrongName`摘錄自 COFF 組件。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`參數和載入 （coff） 映像，請只提供的辨識項會使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 呼叫組件的辨識項和 （coff） 映像的辨識項會被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 反映在 c + + 可執行檔上可能會擲回。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 這可能是因為 c + + 編譯器移除重新配置位址所或`.reloc`從可執行檔的區段。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`位址的 c + + 可執行檔中，指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個屬性和屬性會設定，第一次嘗試載入組件會使用的顯示名稱 (包括所傳回的版本、 文化特性，依此類推，屬性)。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果找不到檔案，用來搜尋組件。If the file is not found, is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用找到的組件，會針對組件比對的顯示名稱。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果配對失敗，就會擲回。If the match fails, a is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會具現化物件，並使用它來載入`sysglobal.dll`組件。The following example instantiates an object and uses it to load the `sysglobal.dll` assembly. 然後這個範例會顯示組件的公用類型的完整名稱。The example then displays the full name of the assembly's public types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件名稱的完整格式是由其簡單名稱 （例如 「 系統 」 System.dll 組件） 以及其版本、 文化特性、 公開金鑰語彙基元和 （選擇性） 其處理器架構所組成。The long form of an assembly name consists of its simple name (such as "System" for the System.dll assembly) along with its version, culture, public key token, and optionally its processor architecture. 它會對應至組件的屬性。It corresponds to the assembly's property. 下列範例說明如何使用載入 System.dll 組件適用於.NET Framework 4 的完整名稱。The following example illustrates the use of a long name to load the System.dll assembly for the .NET Framework 4. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.load/cs/load1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.assembly.load/vb/load1.vb#1)] 如果擲回`assemblyString`指定完整的組件名稱，而第一個符合的簡單名稱的組件有不同的版本、 文化特性或公開金鑰語彙基元。 is thrown if `assemblyString` specifies the full assembly name, and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a different version, culture, or public key token. 載入器不會繼續探查比對的簡單名稱的其他組件。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. 是否將某些使用權限授予組件則以辨識項 (Evidence) 為基礎。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 組件和安全性辨識項合併的規則如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 當您使用方法沒有參數，已載入組件使用載入器提供的辨識項。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 當您使用方法合併片段的辨識項的參數。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段方法取代載入器所提供的辨識項的片段。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 當您使用方法多載`Byte[]`載入的通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 映像，辨識項的參數都繼承自呼叫組件。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 這適用於.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和後續版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 未安裝 SP1，當您使用 1.1 版和.NET Framework 1.0 版中方法多載`Byte[]`結合載入 （coff） 映像，辨識項的參數。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`和`Site`都繼承自呼叫的組件，以及`Hash`和`StrongName`摘錄自 COFF 組件。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`參數和載入 （coff） 映像，請只提供的辨識項會使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 呼叫組件的辨識項和 （coff） 映像的辨識項會被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 反映在 c + + 可執行檔上可能會擲回。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 這可能是因為 c + + 編譯器移除重新配置位址所或`.reloc`從可執行檔的區段。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`位址的 c + + 可執行檔中，指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，處理器架構加入至組件識別，而且可以指定為組件名稱字串的一部分。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, processor architecture is added to assembly identity, and can be specified as part of assembly name strings. 例如，"ProcessorArchitecture = msil"。For example, "ProcessorArchitecture=msil". 不過，指定組件名稱的建議的方式是建立物件，並將它傳遞至適當的多載方法。However, the recommended way to specify an assembly name is to create an object and pass it to an appropriate overload of the method. 請參閱 。See . ## Examples 下列範例會載入組件，指定其完整的名稱，並列出所有包含在指定的組件的類型。The following example loads an assembly given its fully qualified name, and lists all the types contained in the specified assembly. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法載入的組件的信任層級時呼叫的組件的信任層級相同。The trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the calling assembly. 若要從應用程式定義域的信任層級的位元組陣列載入組件，請使用方法多載。To load an assembly from a byte array with the trust level of the application domain, use the method overload. 如需詳細資訊的使用相關的辨識項使用的多載方法採用位元組陣列，請參閱方法多載。For more information about the use of evidence with overloads of the method that take byte arrays, see the method overload. 反映在 c + + 可執行檔上可能會擲回。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 這可能是因為 c + + 編譯器移除重新配置位址所或`.reloc`從可執行檔的區段。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`位址的 c + + 可執行檔中，指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. 請注意，這個方法多載一律會建立新物件與它自己的對應。Note that this method overload always creates a new object with its own mapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果擲回`assemblyRef`指定完整的組件名稱，而第一個符合的簡單名稱的組件有不同的版本、 文化特性或公開金鑰語彙基元。 is thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies the full assembly name, and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a different version, culture, or public key token. 載入器不會繼續探查比對的簡單名稱的其他組件。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. > [!NOTE] > 請勿使用只含屬性集。Do not use an with only the property set. 屬性沒有提供任何項目 （例如名稱或版本） 的組件識別，因此載入不會發生負載所識別的規則，根據您所預期從方法。The property does not supply any elements of the assembly identity (such as name or version), so loading does not occur according to load-by-identity rules, as you would expect from the method. 相反地，載入組件使用載入來源的規則。Instead, the assembly is loaded using load-from rules. 使用載入內容的缺點的相關資訊，請參閱方法多載或[組件載入的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md)。For information about the disadvantages of using the load-from context, see the method overload or [Best Practices for Assembly Loading](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md). 是否將某些使用權限授予組件則以辨識項 (Evidence) 為基礎。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 組件和安全性辨識項合併的規則如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 當您使用方法沒有參數，已載入組件使用載入器提供的辨識項。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 當您使用方法合併片段的辨識項的參數。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段方法取代載入器所提供的辨識項的片段。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 當您使用方法多載`Byte[]`載入的通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 映像，辨識項的參數都繼承自呼叫組件。When you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is inherited from the calling assembly. 這適用於.NET Framework 1.1 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和後續版本。This applies to the .NET Framework version 1.1 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and subsequent releases. > [!NOTE] > 未安裝 SP1，當您使用 1.1 版和.NET Framework 1.0 版中方法多載`Byte[]`結合載入 （coff） 映像，辨識項的參數。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and in version 1.1 without SP1, when you use a method overload with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a COFF image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`和`Site`都繼承自呼叫的組件，以及`Hash`和`StrongName`摘錄自 COFF 組件。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`參數和載入 （coff） 映像，請只提供的辨識項會使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 呼叫組件的辨識項和 （coff） 映像的辨識項會被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored. 反映在 c + + 可執行檔上可能會擲回。Reflecting on C++ executable files might throw a . 這可能是因為 c + + 編譯器移除重新配置位址所或`.reloc`從可執行檔的區段。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the `.reloc` section from your executable file. 若要保留`.reloc`位址的 c + + 可執行檔中，指定`/fixed:no`當您要連結。To preserve the `.reloc` address for your C++ executable file, specify `/fixed:no` when you are linking. > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個屬性和屬性會設定，第一次嘗試載入組件會使用的顯示名稱 (包括所傳回的版本、 文化特性，依此類推，屬性)。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果找不到檔案，用來搜尋組件。If the file is not found, is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用找到的組件，會針對組件比對的顯示名稱。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果配對失敗，就會擲回。If the match fails, a is thrown. 如果您呼叫方法超過一次在相同的組件，但以指定不同的辨識項，common language runtime 不會擲回因為不能有不同的辨識項規格的完整性與等號比較決定。If you call the method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一個成功的辨識項是使用的辨識項。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `assemblyFile`參數必須參考到不含逸出字元的 URI。The `assemblyFile` parameter must refer to a URI without escape characters. 這個方法會提供所有 URI 中的無效字元的逸出字元。This method supplies escape characters for all invalid characters in the URI. > [!NOTE] > 不支援檔案傳輸通訊協定 (FTP)。File transfer protocol (FTP) is not supported. 如果 URI 提供給`assemblyFile`是 FTP 位址，不會載入組件。If the URI supplied for `assemblyFile` is an FTP address, the assembly is not loaded. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. `assemblyFile` 可以是絕對或相對於目前目錄中，而且組件載入至呼叫端的定義域。`assemblyFile` may be absolute or relative to the current directory, and the assembly is loaded into the domain of the caller. 組件可以載入至其中一個三個內容，或可以是沒有內容：Assemblies can be loaded into one of three contexts, or can be loaded without context: - 載入內容，其中包含找到的探查組件： GAC 中，主機組件存放區中如果裝載執行階段，或在和應用程式定義域。The load context contains assemblies found by probing: in the GAC, in a host assembly store if the runtime is hosted, or in the and of the application domain. 方法的大部分多載都會將組件載入此內容中。Most overloads of the method load assemblies into this context. - 載入內容中包含的使用者提供的路徑，不包含探查所搜尋之目錄中的組件。The load-from context contains assemblies for which the user provided a path not included in the directories searched by probing. 、 和 是依路徑載入之方法的範例。, , and are examples of methods that load by path. - 僅限反映的內容，其中包含與載入的組件和方法; 在這些程式碼無法執行內容。The reflection-only context contains assemblies loaded with the and methods; code in these contexts cannot be executed. - 如果使用者已產生或找到組件，它不在任何內容。If the user generated or found the assembly, it is not in any context. 這適用於載入使用的多載的組件指定位元組陣列，包含組件，並使用反映來建立的暫時性動態組件發出，並不會儲存到磁碟的方法。This applies to assemblies loaded using overloads of the method that specify a byte array containing an assembly, and to transient dynamic assemblies created with reflection emit and not saved to disk. 載入內容中允許從探查中, 未包含的路徑載入組件，而且找到並載入，因為路徑資訊由內容維護該路徑可允許相依性。The load-from context allows an assembly to be loaded from a path not included in probing, and yet allows dependencies on that path to be found and loaded because the path information is maintained by the context. 方法有下列缺點。The method has the following disadvantages. 請考慮改用 。Consider using instead. - 如果已載入具有相同身分識別的組件， 會傳回載入的組件，即使指定不同的路徑也是一樣。If an assembly with the same identity is already loaded, returns the loaded assembly even if a different path was specified. - 如果使用 載入組件，之後載入內容中的組件卻試圖根據顯示名稱載入相同組件，則載入嘗試會失敗。If an assembly is loaded with , and later an assembly in the load context attempts to load the same assembly by display name, the load attempt fails. 這可能是組件還原序列化時。This can occur when an assembly is de-serialized. - 如果組件是以載入，和探查路徑中包含的組件相同的身分識別，而另一個位置， ， ，或其他非預期的行為可能會發生。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 要求所指定路徑上的 和 或 。 demands and , or , on the specified path. - 如果原生映像存在`assemblyFile`，不會使用它。If a native image exists for `assemblyFile`, it is not used. 無法以定義域中性方式載入的組件。The assembly cannot be loaded as domain neutral. - 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不會套用原則。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, policy is not applied. ## Examples 下列範例會載入組件，指定其檔案名稱或路徑。The following example loads an assembly given its file name or path. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CPP/assembly.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/CS/assembly.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Assembly#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Assembly/VB/assembly.vb#11)]

如果組件是以載入，和探查路徑中包含的組件相同的身分識別，而另一個位置， ， ，或其他非預期的行為可能會發生。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不會套用原則。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, policy is not applied. 是否將某些使用權限授予組件則以辨識項 (Evidence) 為基礎。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 組件和安全性辨識項合併的規則如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 當您使用方法沒有參數，已載入組件使用載入器提供的辨識項。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 當您使用方法合併片段的辨識項的參數。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段方法取代載入器所提供的辨識項的片段。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 如果您呼叫這個方法一次以上相同的組件，但具有不同的辨識項，指定，common language runtime 不會擲回因為無法判斷相等和不同的辨識項規格的完整性。If you call this method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一個成功的辨識項是使用的辨識項。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`結合載入的通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 映像，辨識項的參數。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`和`Site`都繼承自呼叫的組件，以及`Hash`和`StrongName`摘錄自 COFF 組件。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`參數和載入 （coff） 映像，請只提供的辨識項會使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 呼叫組件的辨識項和 （coff） 映像的辨識項會被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored.

在這些程式碼無法執行內容。The reflection-only context contains assemblies loaded with the and methods; code in these contexts cannot be executed. - 如果使用者已產生或找到組件，它不在任何內容。If the user generated or found the assembly, it is not in any context. 這適用於載入使用的多載的組件指定位元組陣列，包含組件，並使用反映來建立的暫時性動態組件發出，並不會儲存到磁碟的方法。This applies to assemblies loaded using overloads of the method that specify a byte array containing an assembly, and to transient dynamic assemblies created with reflection emit and not saved to disk. 載入內容允許的路徑，不會包含在探查，從載入組件，而且找到並載入，因為路徑資訊由內容維護該路徑上可允許相依性。The load-from context allows an assembly to be loaded from a path that is not included in probing, and yet allows dependencies on that path to be found and loaded because the path information is maintained by the context. 方法有下列缺點。The method has the following disadvantages. 請考慮改用 。Consider using instead. - 如果已載入具有相同身分識別的組件， 會傳回載入的組件，即使指定不同的路徑也是一樣。If an assembly with the same identity is already loaded, returns the loaded assembly even if a different path was specified. - 如果使用 載入組件，之後載入內容中的組件卻試圖根據顯示名稱載入相同組件，則載入嘗試會失敗。If an assembly is loaded with , and later an assembly in the load context attempts to load the same assembly by display name, the load attempt fails. 還原序列化組件時，也可能發生這種情況。This can occur when an assembly is deserialized. - 如果組件是以載入，和探查路徑中包含的組件相同的身分識別，而另一個位置， ， ，或其他非預期的行為可能會發生。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 要求所指定路徑上的 和 或 。 demands and , or , on the specified path. - 如果原生映像存在`assemblyFile`，不會使用它。If a native image exists for `assemblyFile`, it is not used. 組件無法以定義域中性方式載入。The assembly cannot be loaded as domain-neutral. 組件會載入與載入器提供的辨識項。The assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies.

載入內容中包含的使用者提供的路徑，不包含探查所搜尋之目錄中的組件。The load-from context contains assemblies for which the user provided a path not included in the directories searched by probing. 、 和 是依路徑載入之方法的範例。, , and are examples of methods that load by path. - 僅限反映的內容，其中包含與載入的組件和方法; 在這些程式碼無法執行內容。The reflection-only context contains assemblies loaded with the and methods; code in these contexts cannot be executed. - 如果使用者已產生或找到組件，它不在任何內容。If the user generated or found the assembly, it is not in any context. 這適用於載入使用的多載的組件指定位元組陣列，包含組件，並使用反映來建立的暫時性動態組件發出，並不會儲存到磁碟的方法。This applies to assemblies loaded using overloads of the method that specify a byte array containing an assembly, and to transient dynamic assemblies created with reflection emit and not saved to disk. 載入內容中允許從探查中, 未包含的路徑載入組件，而且找到並載入，因為路徑資訊由內容維護該路徑可允許相依性。The load-from context allows an assembly to be loaded from a path not included in probing, and yet allows dependencies on that path to be found and loaded because the path information is maintained by the context. 方法有下列缺點。The method has the following disadvantages. 請考慮改用 。Consider using instead. - 如果組件是以載入，和探查路徑中包含的組件相同的身分識別，而另一個位置， ， ，或其他非預期的行為可能會發生。If an assembly is loaded with , and the probing path includes an assembly with the same identity but a different location, an , , or other unexpected behavior can occur. - 要求所指定路徑上的 和 或 。 demands and , or , on the specified path. - 如果原生映像存在`assemblyFile`，不會使用它。If a native image exists for `assemblyFile`, it is not used. 無法以定義域中性方式載入的組件。The assembly cannot be loaded as domain neutral. - 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不會套用原則。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, policy is not applied. 是否將某些使用權限授予組件則以辨識項 (Evidence) 為基礎。Whether certain permissions are granted or not granted to an assembly is based on evidence. 組件和安全性辨識項合併的規則如下所示：The rules for assembly and security evidence merging are as follows: - 當您使用方法沒有參數，已載入組件使用載入器提供的辨識項。When you use a method with no parameter, the assembly is loaded with the evidence that the loader supplies. - 當您使用方法合併片段的辨識項的參數。When you use a method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段方法取代載入器所提供的辨識項的片段。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader. - 如果您呼叫這個方法一次以上相同的組件，但具有不同的辨識項，指定，common language runtime 不會擲回因為無法判斷相等和不同的辨識項規格的完整性。If you call this method more than once on the same assembly but with a different evidence specified, the common language runtime does not throw a because the equality and integrity of the different evidence specifications cannot be determined. 第一個成功的辨識項是使用的辨識項。The evidence that first succeeds is the evidence that is used. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`結合載入的通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 映像，辨識項的參數。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter to load a common object file format (COFF) image, evidence is combined. `Zone``Url`和`Site`都繼承自呼叫的組件，以及`Hash`和`StrongName`摘錄自 COFF 組件。`Zone`, `Url` and `Site` are inherited from the calling assembly, and `Hash` and `StrongName` are taken from the COFF assembly. - 當您使用方法`Byte[]`參數和載入 （coff） 映像，請只提供的辨識項會使用。When you use a method with a `Byte[]` parameter and to load a COFF image, only the supplied evidence is used. 呼叫組件的辨識項和 （coff） 映像的辨識項會被忽略。Evidence of the calling assembly and evidence of the COFF image is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法載入作業系統標示為已經從 Web （例如，暫存檔案，從網際網路或內部網路下載） 載入的本機組件。Use this method to load a local assembly that the operating system has flagged as having been loaded from the Web (for example, a temporary file that was downloaded from the Internet or intranet). 之前[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，這類組件已自動載入沙箱應用程式定義域。Before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], such assemblies were automatically loaded into a sandboxed application domain. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，它們是以完全信任來載入。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], they are loaded with full trust. 您可以使用這個方法的替代方案，以套用[ <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)應用程式組態檔中。As an alternative to using this method, you can apply the [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md) in your application configuration file. 這會導致 common language runtime 的安全性原則還原[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This causes the common language runtime to revert to the security policy of the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您使用這些解決方案，您必須先確認您可以放心載入`assemblyFile`以完全信任。If you use either of these solutions, you must be certain that it is safe to load `assemblyFile` with full trust. 討論的載入內容中，包含載入來源內容，請參閱方法多載。For a discussion of load contexts, including the load-from context, see the method overload.
